meanings.definition: Not proven to be true or accurate.
meanings.sent1: The website contained unverified information about the mysterious creature.
meanings.sent2: The detective refused to make any conclusions based on unverified evidence.
meanings.sent3: The unverified rumor about a talking dog spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent4: Her unverified claims of being a superhero raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The unverified report of a UFO sighting left everyone curious and skeptical.

meanings.sent1: The unverified ticket did not grant access to the exclusive event.
meanings.sent2: The unverified signature on the document raised concerns about its authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The unverified membership card led to confusion at the club entrance.
meanings.sent4: His unverified identity caused delays at the airport security checkpoint.
meanings.sent5: The unverified payment method resulted in the order being put on hold.
